data.description: Reduce unwanted mail traffic, large tool set
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module set is designed to examine traffic on port 25 for
    incoming mail to an SMTP server. It will tarpit hosts when it
    detects that access should be denied, thus "eating the offender for
    lunch". i.e. SpamCannibal
